properties.description: Copy care blox zip files to file share
UPSERT from Stage tables to final tables in SQL DB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    stgtblEmpJobs.JobAutoId,
    stgtblEmpJobs.EmployeeID,
    stgtblEmpJobs.ContractedHours,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Department,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Role,
    stgtblEmpJobs.JobNo,
    DATEADD(s, StartDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS StartDate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Holidays,
    stgtblEmpJobs.HolidayFull,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SentToUnit,
    stgtblEmpJobs.BreakRule,
    stgtblEmpJobs.ContractID,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Deleted,
    DATEADD(s, StartDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LastUpdate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.WorkingArrangements,
    stgtblEmpJobs.VHEnabled,
    stgtblEmpJobs.VHBalance,
    NULL AS VHBalanceDate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SicknessThreshold,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblEmpJobs

SELECT 
    EmployeeAutoID,
    EmployeeID,
    Title,
    Forename,
    Middlename,
    Surname,
    LocationID,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    AddressLine4,
    AddressLine5,
    PostCode,
    Country,
    Telephone,
    Mobile,
    Email,
    CASE 
        WHEN BirthDate < 0 THEN DATEADD(DAY, -(ABS(BirthDate) / 86400), '1970-01-01') --Convert EPOCH number to a positive with ABS(). Divide by 86400 seconds in a day. Subtract this from 1970-01-01
        ELSE DATEADD(s, BirthDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') 
    END AS BirthDate,
    CountryOfBirth,
    YearOfEntry,
    DATEADD(s, DateStarted, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DateStarted,
    DATEADD(s, LeavingDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LeavingDate,
    LeavingEnteredBy,
    DATEADD(s, LeavingEnteredOn, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LeavingEnteredOn,
    Gender,
    NINumber,
    EthnicOrigin,
    Religion,
    Disability,
    Nationality,
    Dependants,
    AccountNumber,
    AccountName,
    SortCode,
    BankName,
    BankBranch,
    BuildingSocRef,
    MaritalStatus,
    PayMethod,
    UploadAsNewStarter,
    NeedsUploading,
    HasLeft,
    PackageID,
    ImportPackageID,
    ContractedHours,
    DefaultPayRate,
    LeavingReason,
    LeavingDestination,
    IncludeInNextPay,
    OnSick,
    Export,
    SageID,
    TATagID,
    BankStaff,
    PostCodeSearch,
    WorkingTimeWaiver,
    SentToUnit,
    BatchID,
    EmployeeType,
    HolidayMonthStart,
    CreatedByID,
    CreatedByName,
    DATEADD(s, CreatedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS CreatedDate,
    ShortDisplayName,
    DisplayColour,
    ApproverName,
    ApproverID,
    IsApprover,
    TAApprover,
    RosterUnitList,
    PrimaryRosterUnit,
    PortalEnabled,
    PortalPassword,
    NoticePeriod,
    DATEADD(s, DataUpgradedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DataUpgradedDate,
    DataUpgradedBy,
    SourceFileName
  FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblEmployees

SELECT
    PayrollID,
    EmployeeID,
    EmployeeName,
    LocationID,
    RoleID,
    Role,
    TypeID,
    Type,
    Rate,
    Units,
    Comment,
    DATEADD(s, EnteredDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS EnteredDate,
    EnteredBy,
    EnteredByName,
    PeriodNo,
    HasVariance,
    MonthSplit,
    Comitted,
    DATEADD(s, ApprovedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ApprovedDate,
    ApprovedBy,
    ApprovedByName,
    ImportedFromTA,
    WorkedLocationID,
    BatchID,
    DATEADD(s, ItemDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ItemDate,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblPayrollData

SELECT 
    PeriodID,
    CurrentPeriodNum,
    DATEADD(s, DateCreated, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DateCreated,
    LocationID,
    DateRange,
    GeneratedPayroll,
    CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DateRange, 7, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 4, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 1, 2)) AS FromDate,
    CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DateRange, 20, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 17, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 14, 2)) AS ToDate,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblPeriods

SELECT 
    RatesAutoID,
    EmployeeID,
    RoleID,
    TypeID,
    Rate,
    IsDefault,
    SentToUnit,
    Deleted,
    DATEADD(s, LastUpdate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LastUpdate,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblRates

SELECT 
    ShiftID,
    HomeID,
    EmployeeID,
    RoleID,
    DATEADD(s, ShiftStart, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ShiftStart,
    DATEADD(s, ShiftEnd, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ShiftEnd,
    PayRate,
    Department,
    Type,
    SentToUnit,
    Deleted,
    RosterUnitID,
    CreatedBy,
    DATEADD(s, CreatedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS CreatedDate,
    DeletedBy,
    DATEADD(s, DeletedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DeletedDate,
    ITG_SourceID,
    ITG_SourceName,
    ITG_Status,
    RosterType,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblShifts

SELECT
    LocalID,
    TAID,
    EmployeeID,
    HomeID,
    RoleID,
    ShiftID,
    TAStatus,
    DATEADD(s, TADateIn, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS TADateIn,
    DATEADD(s, ActualDateIn, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ActualDateIn,
    DATEADD(s, ConfirmedDateIn, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ConfirmedDateIn,
    EarlyInFlag,
    EarlyInComment,
    LateInFlag,
    LateInComment,
    DATEADD(s, TADateOut, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS TADateOut,
    DATEADD(s, ActualDateOut, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ActualDateOut,
    DATEADD(s, ConfirmedDateOut, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ConfirmedDateOut,
    EarlyOutFlag,
    EarlyOutComment,
    LateOutFlag,
    LateOutComment,
    ManagerApprovalRequiredIn,
    ManagerApprovalRequiredOut,
    RecordedMinutes,
    TATagID,
    ImageFilename,
    Imported,
    SrcUnit,
    ExternalWorkerName,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblTAData

SELECT
    UniqueID
    ,EmployeeID
    ,DATEADD(SECOND, StartDate % 86400, DATEADD(DAY, StartDate / 86400, '1970-01-01 00:00:00')) AS StartDate
    ,EmployeeName
    ,DATEADD(SECOND, EndDate % 86400, DATEADD(DAY, EndDate / 86400, '1970-01-01 00:00:00')) AS EndDate
    ,Status
    ,LocationID
    ,StartDetails
    ,EndDetails
    ,DATEADD(SECOND, EnteredOn % 86400, DATEADD(DAY, EnteredOn / 86400, '1970-01-01 00:00:00')) AS EnteredOn
    ,DATEADD(SECOND, UpdatedOn % 86400, DATEADD(DAY, UpdatedOn / 86400, '1970-01-01 00:00:00')) AS UpdatedOn
    ,EnteredBy
    ,UpdatedBy
    ,Export
    ,ShowAlert
    ,Department
    ,RosterID
    ,Role
    ,DaysTaken
    ,EnteredByID
    ,BatchId
    ,AbsenceCode
    ,AbsenceCategory
    ,BradfordFactorInclude
    ,Reviewed
    ,UpdatedByID
    ,UpdateType
    ,DATEADD(SECOND, ExpectedEndDate % 86400, DATEADD(DAY, ExpectedEndDate / 86400, '1970-01-01 00:00:00')) AS ExpectedEndDate
    ,ActivityID
    ,ActivityLocationID
    ,SentToUnit
    ,SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblCalender

properties.description: Downloads .bak files from the CareBlox FTP
Copies Parquet files from file share to azure blob storage. Then deletes the files on the file share.
Load data from the parquet files to the stage (STG) tables in SQL TRANSFORM DB

activities.name: Set DateString
activities.description: Sets the date string used for Dataset property

properties.description: Extracts the Rooms from the Polestar DB on AH2, to a table in Avery DB on AH2
Copies data from the view in Polestar to Avery DB. Lists all rooms in CH and the active resident record assigned to that home

activities.name: Refresh Data
activities.description: Truncates table in Avery DB and Inserts data from Polestar DB using the view.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    [ROOM_REF]
    ,[ROOM_CODE]
    ,[ROOM_DESC]
    ,[USEFLAG]
    ,[HOME_REF]
    ,[RES_REF]
    ,[RES_CODE]
    ,[ResidentStatus]
    ,[Firstname]
    ,[Surname]
    ,[AdmissionAnalysis]
    ,[AdmissionType]
    ,[ResidentAdmissionReason]
    ,[AnalysisGroup]
    ,ResidentsAssigned
FROM 
    [dbo].[vRoomsWithInHomeResidentDetails]
ORDER BY
    Home_Ref ASC,
    ROOM_Ref ASC

activities.name: Update Room Occupancy
activities.description: Updates the Pricing.Room tables occupancy using the refreshed data

properties.description: Moves the exported csv file from the Azure File Share to Azure Storage Container. The file contains list of Exchequer companies and the users with access to it

activities.name: Copy CSV
activities.description: Copy CSV file to Exchequer Azure Container

properties.description: Downloads the Output file that Hydra generate from their FTP to an Azure Fileshare.

activities.name: Download File
activities.description: Downloads radar-output.xml file from Hydra FTP to azure blob storage

activities.name: Remove Existing File
activities.description: Deletes any previous radar-output.xml file on the fileshare before copying the new one there.

properties.description: Inserts the data from the Exported report into AH2 Avery Audit.ExchequerCompanyAccess

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ID
      ,Job_Code
      ,ISNULL(Job_Category, '') AS JobCategory
      ,ISNULL(job_cat2, '') AS JobCategory2
      ,ISNULL(Description, '') AS JobDesctiption
      ,ISNULL(SupportType, '') AS SupportType
  FROM dbo.WeeklyHrs_Cat

properties.description: Get data from the supplied endpoint (query/report) for the supplied community ID

activities.name: Copy 90 Days Occupancy Data
activities.description: Copies data from Polestar DB Occupancy table to TRANSFOR_DB OCCUPANCY_INCR table. Only the last 90 days of records

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select * from dbo.Occupancy where CAST(CreateDateTime as date)>= '@{variables('DeleteDate')}'

activities.name: Add new records to Occupancy Table

text.value:
Delete from Transform_DB.STG.OCCUPANCY
WHERE CreateDateTime>= '@{variables('DeleteDate')}'

Insert into Transform_DB.STG.OCCUPANCY 
Select * from Transform_DB.STG.OCCUPANCY_INCR

properties.description: Executes procedures that create or alter views each day.
removes files older than 30 days in the softworks and careblox containers
Upserts Avery.SalariedStaff in Transform_DB from csv file. The csv file is an extract of the excel file found on the Y drive (Y:\Databases\Uploads\Weekly_hrs)

dependsOn.activity: Copy file to Azure Blob storage

activities.name: Copy file to Azure Blob storage
Set WeekEndingDate
activities.description: Set the previous week ending date in the dd-MM-yyyy format for the API

activities.name: Set WeekBegining Date
activities.description: Set the previous week Start date in the dd-MM-yyyy format for the API

activities.name: Download Clockings data
activities.description: Start date in the body looks to be irrelevant, it uses the end date to return emp with a start date less than that.
